column5: Got out with my pup Roloff for a quick shore fish.  Weather was disgusting, but love that......guaranteed to keep the riff raff off the shore marks  Bite was on! lots of keeper size fish  Left with a nice stringer....and even better....a very tired dog!   Jig and large minnow, retrieved slowly in about 18'FOW  Wind howling 20kmh+ from NE  heavy rain / sleet, +5C        <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8elFuEcIQTs" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
awesome dog is right. He's a handsome pup for sure!

Simon, your dog is getting bigger and he seems to love fishing...he is my favourite color for labs. Nice amount of walleye from just shore fishing...even with the bad weather it was not a bad day overall.
Good stuff Simon - what an awesome looking pup to!  Thanks for the post!
Awesome as always Simon!!!!  Snow should be at your doorstep any time now

also knows as Simon goes to the seafood section... so was this off the the end of your yard or did you actually have to drive more thn five minutes to get this feast?  Nice stringer.  Rolof wont be a pup much longer., but he sure is  growing into a good looking dog.  I suspect he and Jack are pretty tight too?
Roloff sure makes for a great fishing partner! Great report and I'm sure that many of us are jealous of that sweet shore spot. Thanks for the report.
Nice pup!..gotta luv the brown labs, got one myself and she's awesome
nice place and fishing ... cool dog too.
Great catch from shore Simon , love the dog pictures

Thanks man  We definitely got one of the better ones of the litter. His brother lives just up the road and is all shaggy and half Roloff's size.      Thanks, he just needs to calm down a bit.....lol.      Yhanks Ryan, this time last year i would not have believed i would enjoy having a dog.....i still cant believe it....lol.       It hit overnight Rick....Jack literally squeeled with delight when he saw it this morning...we were out in it by 7:30am                  I actually had to drive for 15 minutes....friggin hardship! Jack and Rollff have a LOVE/HATE thing goin' on.....lol.       Thanks dood.       AWESOME looking pup! She looks real smart and well trained too.        Thanks       Not a bad shore session for sure......walleye tacos for supper tonite
Very cool, great report, thanks for sharing...and while I've never had a lab, I do think they are great dogs, and your is no exception
